app.name: GBA Bonus Pack
app.short_description: Access special content in GBA games.
app.long_description:
This tool can unlock or transfer data to certain GBA games that had distribution events or similar content.
Games supported: * Zelda ALTTP/Four Swords * Fire Emblem * Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones * Sonic Advance * Sonic Advance 2 * Sonic Pinball Party * Pokémon FireRed / LeafGreen * Pokémon Ruby / Sapphire * Pokémon Emerald
Zelda: Gives you access to a new dungeon. FE7/FE8: Adds a menu for bonus items. Tiny Chao Garden games can transfer rare chao. Pokémon games can transfer Jirachi.
This tool works by modifying savefiles on the storage device available. It will look for GBI-style dumps. E.g. AXVE01.FLA in the root, it will also try to look for RetroArch HEXAeco-style saves in a path like this: /private/other/savefiles/Sonic Advance 2.srm
Additional Credits: Phonymike: TCG crc. LemonBoy: Zelda checksum. Bulbapedia: Pokémon docs. sirius1428: Finding FE8's Transfer Data menu.
